scripts.publish:pact: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'export GITHUB_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && export GITHUB_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && if [ "$GITHUB_BRANCH" = "main" ]; then pact-broker publish ./pacts --consumer-app-version="main" --branch=$GITHUB_BRANCH --broker-base-url=$PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL --broker-token=$PACT_BROKER_TOKEN; else pact-broker publish ./pacts --consumer-app-version=$GITHUB_SHA --branch=$GITHUB_BRANCH --broker-base-url=$PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL --broker-token=$PACT_BROKER_TOKEN; fi'
scripts.test:provider: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'export GITHUB_SHA=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && export GITHUB_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && jest provider/provider-contract.spec.js --testTimeout=20000'
scripts.can:i:deploy:provider: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'export GITHUB_SHA=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant MoviesAPI --version=$GITHUB_SHA --to-environment production --broker-base-url=$PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL'
scripts.record:provider:deployment: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'export GITHUB_SHA=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && pact-broker record-deployment --pacticipant MoviesAPI --version $GITHUB_SHA --environment production'
scripts.can:i:deploy:consumer: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'export GITHUB_SHA=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant WebConsumer --version=$GITHUB_SHA --to-environment production'
scripts.record:consumer:deployment: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'export GITHUB_SHA=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && pact-broker record-deployment --pacticipant WebConsumer --version $GITHUB_SHA --environment production'
